name: Foolzbrave Balloon Popping Adventure DX
description:
The original Foolzbrave Balloon Popping Adventure game is back with brand new content! Two new stages, three new hats & tubs, new mechanics and no more drag mode!

Pilot Foolzbrave on a journey to reach the ground safely, after getting stranded in the sky from a trap!

Pop balloons in the 7 stages: Free Fall, Boundaries of Steel, Powerful Machines, All-in-one, Dangerous Race, and Xtra Large; each with their own mechanics! 

In Adventure Mode, attempt to reach the ground safely from high in the sky. Bonus points are given if the ground is reached in one piece.

In Infinite Mode,  the game continues for as long as you can stand. In this DX experience, the All-in-one stage contains special objectives to complete, rewarding bonus points if all are completed before the game ends. 

Various cosmetic items are also selectable to alter Foolzbrave's appearance. High Scores are saved and viewable on the title screen, so you can check all of your highest scores in one place!

Special Thanks to Explosions Central for play-testing and providing some ideas of features.
